metadata.title: CVE-2020-27763 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/resize.c. An attacker whosubmits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could triggerundefined behavior in the form of math division by zero. This would mostlikely lead to an impact to application availability, but could potentiallycause other problems related to undefined behavior. This flaw affectsImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.8-68.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
